title: Process Annual Salary Increase Cycle
description: An HR compensation analyst needs to process the annual merit-based salary increases for the company.

tasks.description: Receive the approved merit increase budgets and guidelines from leadership.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst receives the overall budget (e.g., 3% of total salaries).

tasks.description: Provide managers with worksheets to enter recommended increases for their employees based on performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst distributes compensation planning worksheets to all managers.

tasks.description: Once all recommendations are approved, perform a bulk upload to update employee salaries in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully uploads the new salary data into the system, effective on the specified date.
